data.text: @dcairns199 @Stewart07385081 @scotgov The vaccines also cause blood clots and that’s a known fact. I’d look at when she had her vaccines and when she had covid in relation to this. We all know now that in the past two years, they’ve been lying to us - if it is vaccine damage, she can apply for compensation now.
@doowizzles @Stewart07385081 @scotgov The stroke caused by blood clots caused by COVID paralysed her!
@doowizzles @Stewart07385081 @scotgov I assure you it was covid. They could give her nothing but oxygen! Because that’s all there was then!

@dcairns199 @Stewart07385081 @scotgov I’m sorry to hear about your mother but I fear something they gave her paralysed her. I too have had paralysis in the past and that was due to a vaccine. Perhaps it’s more down that route that the problem is. I hope she finds comfort, it’s not pleasant living in that body.

@doowizzles @Stewart07385081 @scotgov Old people don’t care!?? I think my mum, who, because of covid is now paralysed and living in a care home CARES, along with all the people who live with her, and those of us who are in the community and have to visit. We CARE!! Ffs
@scotgov you only get up to date figures by going into the link, useless
@cellophane_monk @scotgov What about families who have no food or can't hear their house? A few late ferries pale into insignificance... if those are your Tory priorities then you are off your head.

@cellophane_monk @scotgov Yet, they still find enough space in their back pockets while refusing to feed hungry children until a footballer shames them.  No, you are clearly a cruel, uncaring individual and I am done with you. I hope karma doesnt strike too hard. God bless.
@mozzaisgod @scotgov What about the people of Scotland who rely on them?
